data.name: Quality Education on Software Design Principles
data.statement: The system shall support the educational objectives by providing examples of software design principles.

data.name: Quality Education on Software Analysis
data.statement: The system shall include features that support teaching software analysis.

data.name: Quality Education on Requirements Traceability
data.statement: The system shall include features that support teaching requirements traceability.

data.name: Visual Examples of Requirements Traceability
data.statement: The system shall include visual representations of real-world requirements traceability examples.

data.name: User-Friendly Tool for Requirements Traceability
data.statement: The system shall be user-friendly and visually demonstrate the principles of requirements traceability.

data.name: Support Common SW Development Models
data.statement: The system shall support various software development methodologies, including waterfall, iterative-incremental, and agile.

data.name: Custom Item Types
data.statement: The system shall enable users to define custom item types.

data.name: Custom User Levels
data.statement: The system shall enable users to define custom user levels.

data.name: Custom Levels for Requirements
data.statement: The system shall allow users to define levels for requirements, each characterized by a color.

data.name: Display Different Versions of Traceability Hierarchy
data.statement: The system shall manage and display different versions of the traceability hierarchy.
